photoAlt: A white background with three sections in a column. The first section is a 5 by 6 grid of squares; the first row is filled with the letters pearl, the others are blank. Below the grid is an input with the word CHART inside it, followed by a qwerty keyboard display, with a mix of green, dark gray, and light gray backgrounds.
tagline: Guess the word in 6 guesses or less!
title: Wordle

instructions.overview: Guess the 5 letter word within 6 guesses!
details: Use your keyboard to type a 5 letter word. Press the Enter key to submit your guess.
The word you guessed will fill into the game board, with a color behind each letter to provide hints on how close you are.
Green background means that letter is in the right place.
Yellow background means the letter is in the word but in another place.
Gray background means that letter is not in the word.
